title: How do I know what internet speed I need ?
body:
So tomorrow I am moving into a new apartment with two friends and we are all avid   LOL players and I was just wondering if our internet package of 60Mbps will be sufficient enough to allow us all to play at the same time without any problems or will I need to upgrade it in the near future?
Note: (it's cable internet, and the provider is Charter.)

replies.body:
60MBps is a pretty good connection speed compared to the rest of NA. I can't tell you for sure that your connection will be perfect, but unless everyone is heavily multitasking or video streaming, I can't see your proposed package speed being an issue.

If you happen to experience issues after getting everything set up, please let me know.

P.S. Congrats on the new apartment. I hope your neighbors don't mind the victory cheers when you steal baron or get that sweet penta kill. :P
Appreciate the response, will definitely let you know how it's going after we get everything set up!  And thanks for the congratulations!
